title: I Downloaded my Facebook data, and here's What Happened - Mrinal Saha
description:
After the tweet from Dylan McKay went viral, where he showed how he found his year-old dataâ€”including complete logs of incoming and outgoing calls and SMS messages

I wanted to know more about what information Facebook has on me. So, I downloaded my Facebook data and the results were surprising. 


4 Steps to Protect your privacy on Facebook

1. Install no script

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/disconnect-facebook-pixel/nnkndeagapifodhlebifbgbonbfmlnfm?hl=en

2. Revoke access to all the apps and games on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/mobile/messenger/contacts/

3. Deleted everything from my Facebook feed. 

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/social-book-post-manager/ljfidlkcmdmmibngdfikhffffdmphjae

4. Unfollow every friend and pages on Facebook

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/toolkit-for-facebook/fcachklhcihfinmagjnlomehfdhndhep

Delete the contact from Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/mobile/messenger/contacts/
